About

Hi, I'm Koichi.

Some people call me Koh. I'm a Cognitive Science student interested in Brain-Machine Interfaces and Machine Learning. Originally from Japan, I'm currently an international student at De Anza College, CA. Born in December 9, 2004. Keep up with me on Twitter or LinkedIn. Feel free to contact me at hello@koichin.com for any inquiries.

Vision

My life goal is to advance humanity by techonology with philosophy. At the end of the day, we, including me, will die. But I believe the fact that we made something valuable for us, humanity, and our predecessors will be long-lasting as it's worthwhile. So, I believe contributing to humanity's advance is the essential and meaningful direction I should have. Technology is magic. It has changed the world. I think the next big thing will be Brain-Machine Interfaces. When we can directly connect to a cutting-edge computer at any time, that will accelerate everything and help bring humanity to the final stage. I don I will be the "fierce nerd" to lock myself in a room and work on something that matters.

Education

September 2023 - Present: De Anza College, CA, United States
April 2021 - March 2023: N High School, Okinawa, Japan
April 2020 - March 2021: Tsuda Gakuen High School, Mie, Japan
